list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass the tongue over (something) in order to taste, moisten, or clean it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he licked the stamp and stuck it on the envelope
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh liếm tem và dán nó vào phong bì

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: all right Mary, I know when I'm licked
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tất cả đều đúng Mary, tôi biết khi nào tôi liếm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of licking something with the tongue.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Sammy gave his fingers a long lick
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sammy đã cho ngón tay của mình một liếm lâu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a light coating or quick application of something, especially paint.
a short phrase or solo in jazz or popular music.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his mother gave him several licks for daring to blaspheme
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mẹ anh đã cho anh một số liếm vì dám đến Blaspheme
